channel.title: Vengeance Glitch - Drop Dead Jagex!
channel.description:
I was @ a houseparty fighting people
i had dharoks,ruby,beserker ring and yes a Redh,ween mask and 34 mill whit me (some items like whip) (everything i ever wanted on runescape)
i have been working 2 years on this amount of stuff until a week ago
like i said i was in a house,s dungeon when suddenly a guy starts fucking whining i lower u i lower u i didnt want it but still he was 124 so hed beat me easy me being 103
so id let him suddenly guy pops up low lvl but i didnt want to att him,auto rea was on he attacked me auto att him back he took spinning plate and the house owner kickd me out
i teleported out i had 0 hp took a hit of 7 died and lost all my stuff beside a FUCKING shit dh plate legs and axe (nice i coudnt even keep my 4mill fury!)
this bug was being done whit guess what the NEW MAGIC (vengeance spell) and ring of recoil this bug haas been there for 3,5weeks now and its still not fixed
lots of people have been scammed this way,so i did send jagex a complaint well as i espected i got an automated message back but when i readed the line
~It would be easy to get your stuff back quikly,or even better items as runescape has been made to gain items back easy~
-It took me FUCKING 2 years getting over 60 mill! -How can you get better items when u just lost the BEST items of the game? -Its your(jagex) fault i lost my stuff! ---------------------------------------
*Bug still not fixed *I did not get refunded(whatso ever)(tough other games,mu-online,eudemons give refunds if buglosses) *Sold my acount 100Euro,s adios Runescape (il play on my own server!)

item.title: Vengeance Glitch - Drop Dead Jagex!
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

fellixombc:

me too. i’m just saying this: you played for 2 years and had 60m and you just lost it all…how would you feal?

I’m not sure how I would feal, but I wouldn’t care much, I only pk so the only money I need is to replace lost things, and buy arrows and runes etc to train accounts.

This isn’t the place to rant about being scammed, actually I think there is a sticky somewhere saying not to make posts saying you got scammed. Solely for the reason that we do not care.

What he should have done, is not make a topic and instead send a message to Jagex about the scam so they can fix it.

Read full topic
